answerText: Major Barbara[10] Major Barbara is a work by this Irish author who also wrote the hilarious plays Pygmalion and Mrs. Warren's Profession.
heading: MUT |2012 | 3 | 21 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In this work, Cusins admits that his parents' marriage is only legal in Australia, making him a foundling. For 10 points each: [10] Name this play in which the title Salvation Army worker becomes upset when her father, munitions manufacturer Andrew Undershaft, offers to buy the charity.
